channel.title: Barrage Freeze
channel.description: Ok well a while ago i added barrage freeze fix 2 deltascape and range/mage works for it but Melee doesn't and i was wondering if anyone knows how and i forgot what to search for it i got the tutorial from R~S

item.title: Barrage Freeze
item.dc:creator: @benesjake benesjake
item.description:
@benesjake wrote:

look for (in client.java)

if (followID > 0) {
followDirection();
}
if (followID2 > 0) {
followDirection2();
}

Replace that with this

if (followID > 0) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastEntangle < entangleDelay) {
} else
followDirection();
}
if (followID2 > 0) {
followDirection2();
}

Read full topic
